name: DOOM JAM (intro demo)
description:
𝕯𝖔𝖔𝖒 𝕵𝖆𝖒

a dating sim except it's made by sournoodl. You can expect angst, puns, guitars and occasional occultism.
And yes, adult content may be involved ;)

Unlike your typical visual novel, every single line of dialogue will be an individual drawing, so you're basically getting a fully cinematic game. By donating to this game, you'll allow me to pay a little extra to everyone who will be helping me with this project and get WIPs, doodles and occasional shitposts about the game.

Excited? Consider a one-time donation here or support the development monthly on Patreon! https://www.patreon.com/sournoodl
